card.name: Arcane Signet
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Archaeomancer's Map
card.text: When Archaeomancer's Map enters the battlefield, search your library for up to two basic Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player controls more lands than you, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an artifact card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Audacious Reshapers deals damage to you equal to the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Osgir, the Reconstructor
card.text: Vigilance {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {X}, {T}, Exile an artifact with mana value X from your graveyard: Create two tokens that are copies of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Oversimplify
card.text: Exile all creatures. Each player creates a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token and puts a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the total power of creatures they controlled that were exiled this way.

card.name: Paradox Zone
card.text: Paradox Zone enters the battlefield with a growth counter on it. At the beginning of your end step, double the number of growth counters on Paradox Zone. Then create a 0/0 blue and green Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of growth counters on Paradox Zone.

card.name: Perplexing Test
card.text: Choose one — • Return all creature tokens to their owners' hands. • Return all nontoken creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Phyrexia's Core
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Pia Nalaar
card.text: When Pia Nalaar enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {1}{R}: Target artifact creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Pilgrim's Eye
card.text: Flying When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Plaxcaster Frogling
card.text: Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {2}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Ponder
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library. Draw a card.

card.name: Primal Empathy
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control a creature with the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.

card.name: Promise of Loyalty
card.text: Each player puts a vow counter on a creature they control and sacrifices the rest. Each of those creatures can't attack you for as long as it has a vow counter on it.

card.name: Pyromancer's Goggles
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. When that mana is spent to cast a red instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Quicksmith Genius
card.text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Radiant Performer
card.text: Flash When Radiant Performer enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, choose target spell or ability that targets only a single permanent or player. Copy that spell or ability for each other permanent or player the spell or ability could target. Each copy targets a different one of those permanents and players.

card.name: Rampaging Baloths
card.text: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Rapid Hybridization
card.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.

card.name: Reef Worm
card.text: When Reef Worm dies, create a 3/3 blue Fish creature token with "When this creature dies, create a 6/6 blue Whale creature token with 'When this creature dies, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.'"

card.name: Reinterpret
card.text: Counter target spell. You may cast a spell with an equal or lesser mana value from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Reliquary Tower
card.text: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Replication Technique
card.text: Demonstrate (When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it. Players may choose new targets for their copies.) Create a token that's a copy of target permanent you control.

card.name: Return of the Wildspeaker
card.text: Choose one — • Draw cards equal to the greatest power among non-Human creatures you control. • Non-Human creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Return to Dust
card.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Rionya, Fire Dancer
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create X tokens that are copies of another target creature you control, where X is one plus the number of instant and sorcery spells you've cast this turn. They gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Rite of Replication
card.text: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.) Create a token that's a copy of target creature. If this spell was kicked, create five of those tokens instead.

card.name: Rousing Refrain
card.text: Add {R} for each card in target opponent's hand. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. Exile Rousing Refrain with three time counters on it. Suspend 3—{1}{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Rout
card.text: You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Ruin Grinder
card.text: Menace When Ruin Grinder dies, each player may discard their hand and draw seven cards. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card. Reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Ruxa, Patient Professor
card.text: Whenever Ruxa, Patient Professor enters the battlefield or attacks, return target creature card with no abilities from your graveyard to your hand. Creatures you control with no abilities get +1/+1. You may have creatures you control with no abilities assign their combat damage as though they weren't blocked.

card.name: Sanctum Gargoyle
card.text: Flying When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Scavenger Grounds
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Exile all cards from all graveyards.

card.name: Scholarship Sponsor
card.text: When Scholarship Sponsor enters the battlefield, each player who controls fewer lands than the player who controls the most lands searches their library for a number of basic land cards less than or equal to the difference, puts those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

card.name: Scrap Trawler
card.text: Whenever Scrap Trawler or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser converted mana cost.

card.name: Sculpting Steel
card.text: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

card.name: Seething Song
card.text: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.

card.name: Sequence Engine
card.text: {X}, {T}: Exile target creature card with mana value X from a graveyard. Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Serum Visions
card.text: Draw a card. Scry 2.

card.name: Shamanic Revelation
card.text: Draw a card for each creature you control. Ferocious — You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Shivan Reef
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Simic Growth Chamber
card.text: Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield tapped. When Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{U}.

card.name: Slayers' Stronghold
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains vigilance and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Sly Instigator
card.text: {U}, {T}: Until your next turn, target creature an opponent controls can't be blocked. Goad that creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

card.name: Sol Ring
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Solemn Simulacrum
card.text: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Spawning Kraken
card.text: Whenever a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent you control deals combat damage to a player, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.

card.name: Spitting Image
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Steel Hellkite
card.text: Flying {2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Steel Overseer
card.text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

card.name: Stinging Study
card.text: You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone.

card.name: Study Hall
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. When you spend this mana to cast your commander, scry X, where X is the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

card.name: Sun Titan
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Sunbird's Invocation
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. You may cast a spell with converted mana cost X or less from among cards revealed this way without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Surge to Victory
card.text: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Creatures you control get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's mana value. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Swarm Intelligence
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Talisman of Creativity
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Talisman of Creativity deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Talrand, Sky Summoner
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

card.name: Temple of Epiphany
card.text: Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Temple of Mystery
card.text: Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Temple of Triumph
card.text: Temple of Triumph enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Triumph enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Tempting Contract
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent may create a Treasure token. For each opponent who does, you create a Treasure token.

card.name: Terastodon
card.text: When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

card.name: Theoretical Duplication
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control this turn, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

card.name: Thopter Engineer
card.text: When Thopter Engineer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Artifact creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

card.name: Thousand-Year Elixir
card.text: You may activate abilities of creatures you control as though those creatures had haste. {1}, {T}: Untap target creature.

card.name: Tranquil Thicket
card.text: Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Traumatic Visions
card.text: Counter target spell. Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Treasure Cruise
card.text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Draw three cards.

card.name: Triplicate Titan
card.text: Flying, vigilance, trample When Triplicate Titan dies, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with flying, a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with vigilance, and a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with trample.

card.name: Trygon Predator
card.text: Flying Whenever Trygon Predator deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

card.name: Unstable Obelisk
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Unstable Obelisk: Destroy target permanent.

card.name: Veyran, Voice of Duality
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Veyran, Voice of Duality gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you casting or copying an instant or sorcery spell causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Volcanic Vision
card.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

card.name: Wake the Past
card.text: Return all artifact cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Wildfire Devils
card.text: When Wildfire Devils enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose a player at random. That player exiles an instant or sorcery card from their graveyard. Copy that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Willowdusk, Essence Seer
card.text: {1}, {T}: Choose another target creature. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of life you gained this turn or the amount of life you lost this turn, whichever is greater. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Willowdusk, Essence Seer
card.text: {1}, {T}: Choose another target creature. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of life you gained this turn or the amount of life you lost this turn, whichever is greater. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Yavimaya Coast
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Zaffai, Thunder Conductor
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. If that spell's mana value is 5 or greater, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. If that spell's mana value is 10 or greater, Zaffai, Thunder Conductor deals 10 damage to an opponent chosen at random.

card.name: Zaffai, Thunder Conductor
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. If that spell's mana value is 5 or greater, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. If that spell's mana value is 10 or greater, Zaffai, Thunder Conductor deals 10 damage to an opponent chosen at random.
